name: The Silent Sisters: The Mystery of The Funeral Home
name_original: The Silent Sisters: The Mystery of The Funeral Home
description:
First day of your new job. 

You are a security guard making sure everything is in order at Walter Mortuary, but you start to experience a series of strange events that will make you regret having chosen this job.

A short game made with a lot of enthusiasm and a lot of love. My first horror-themed solitaire game.  Always attentive to comments in order to improve.

Estimated time: 5 minutes.

Design of notes : https://www.instagram.com/willedrien_/

⸸⸸⸸⸸⸸⸸⸸⸸⸸

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

Switch to sprint

E to use

F to switch to torch
